item.title: 英国酝酿针对关键战略产业的新投资者签证
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的政府正在制定计划，为在英国投资巨额资金的外国人提供特殊签证，以缓解近期税收上调和工作许可限制扩大对经济的打击。【原文：The UK is drawing up plans for a special visa for foreigners who invest significant sums in Britain, as Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s government seeks to blunt the economic blow from recent tax hikes and wider curbs on work permits.】

item.title: 共和党出售 880 亿美元无线电频谱的计划面临争议
item.description: 共和党高层正计划将价值 880 亿美元的无线电频谱拍卖给无线宽带公司威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Top Republicans are planning to auction $88 billion worth of radio spectrum to wireless broadband companies Verizon Communications Inc. and Elon Musk’s Starlink to help pay for their massive tax package — but the proposal faces stiff opposition from senators concerned about the potential impact to defense systems.】

item.title: 人工智能推动需求增长，思科对销售额作出积极预测
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc.【原文：Cisco Systems Inc. gave a solid forecast for revenue in the current quarter, a sign the largest seller of networking gear is benefiting from demand for systems using AI technology.】

item.title: 马里兰州州长指责特朗普，马里兰州信用评级遭下调
item.description: 据周三的一份报告称，由于受到联邦政策变化的影响，穆迪评级公司将马里兰州的信用评级从 Aaa 下调一级至 Aa1。【原文：Maryland had its credit rating downgraded one level to Aa1 from Aaa by Moody’s Ratings because of its exposure to shifting federal policies, according to a Wednesday report.】

item.title: 乡村路影院与华纳兄弟将推迟《黑客帝国》债务之争
item.description: 黑客帝国》电影背后的两家电影制片厂正在推迟争夺多达 1 亿美元的电影未偿债务，直到拍卖破产电影制片商 Village Roadshow Entertainment Group 的电影资料库之后。【原文：The two movie studios behind The Matrix films are putting off fighting over as much as $100 million in unpaid debt related to the movies until after an auction for the film library of bankrupt filmmaker Village Roadshow Entertainment Group.】

item.title: 阿根廷四月通胀因货币政策变化而放缓
item.description: 阿根廷 4 月份的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，尽管交易员们都在赌货币政策的改变会引发波动。【原文：Argentina’s inflation slowed down more than expected in April despite a change in the currency policy traders were betting would fan volatility.】

item.title: Uber 与 Prosus 支持的 iFood 在竞争激烈的巴西市场展开合作
item.description: 共享出行巨头优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Rideshare giant Uber Technologies Inc. and Prosus NV-backed delivery service iFood are partnering to integrate their services into each others’ apps in Brazil, a strategic move to grow their presence in a market where China’s Meituan and Didi Global Inc. are also competing.】

item.title: 纽伯格、富兰克林与沙特财富基金签署投资协议
item.description: 富兰克林资源公司（Franklin Resources Inc.）和 Neuberger Berman 公司与沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金达成了数十亿美元的投资协议，这是沙特阿拉伯吸引美国资金管理公司投资该国的最新迹象。【原文：Franklin Resources Inc. and Neuberger Berman reached multibillion-dollar investment deals with Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund, the latest signs that the country is attracting US money managers to invest in the kingdom.】

item.title: 人工智能成本上升，微软裁员对程序员打击最大
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）最近宣布的裁员计划对公司产品的开发人员影响最大，这表明在人工智能时代，即使是软件开发人员也面临着风险。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s recently announced job cuts fell hardest on the people who build the company’s products, showing that even software developers are at risk in the age of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 巴西第一夫人向习近平抱怨 TikTok 对儿童的影响
item.description: 巴西第一夫人罗桑格拉-达席尔瓦在北京的一次官方晚宴上向中国领导人抱怨 TikTok 可能对妇女和儿童造成的有害影响，这是对社交媒体公司的继续讨伐，此前曾引发过争议。【原文：Brazil first lady Rosangela da Silva complained to China’s leader about potentially harmful effects of TikTok on women and children during an official dinner in Beijing, continuing a crusade against social media companies that has sparked controversy before.】

item.title: 收购 Deribit 之后，Coinbase 的阿姆斯特朗希望进行更多收购
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.首席执行官布莱恩-阿姆斯特朗（Brian Armstrong）表示，继本月早些时候以 29 亿美元协议收购衍生品交易所 Deribit 之后，这家美国最大的加密货币交易所将继续寻求并购。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brian Armstrong said the largest US crypto exchange continues to look at mergers and acquisitions, following its $2.9 billion agreement to buy the derivatives exchange Deribit earlier this month.】

item.title: 股价上涨 720% 的电池制造商提前签署数据中心协议
item.description: Eos Energy Enterprises 公司的股价在过去一年中飙升了 720% 以上，该公司已与一家大型数据中心开发商签订了初步协议，因为电力使用量的飙升促进了对电池的需求。【原文：Eos Energy Enterprises Inc., whose stock has surged more than 720% over the past year, has signed an initial pact with a large-scale developer of data centers as soaring power usage boosts demand for batteries.】

item.title: 莱诺体育收购葡萄牙本菲卡足球俱乐部股份
item.description: 包括私募股权公司新月资本（Crescent Capital）联合创始人在内的投资集团 Lenore Sports Partners 收购了葡萄牙最有价值足球俱乐部之一本菲卡 SAD 公司的少数股份。【原文：Lenore Sports Partners, an investment group that includes the co-founder of private equity firm Crescent Capital, has acquired a minority stake in Benfica SAD, the company that manages one of the most valuable Portuguese football clubs.】

item.title: 特朗普屈服，但买家要小心
item.description: 既然中美贸易战已经降级，华尔街的每个人似乎都认为经济衰退的风险已大大降低。这表明国债收益率将上升，因为美联储不需要救市了。【原文：Now that the trade war between the US and China has de-escalated, everyone on Wall Street seems to think the risk of recession is greatly diminished. This suggests that Treasury yields will rise because the Federal Reserve won’t need to save the day.】

item.title: 股票 ETF 重获流量领先地位，VOO 资产达到 6480 亿美元
item.description: 美国股市的忠实投资者卷土重来。【原文：Faithful investors in the US stock market are back in full force.】

item.title: 伊利诺伊州因经济和联邦资金困境下调收入预期
item.description: 伊利诺伊州将下一财年的收入预测削减了约 5 亿美元，理由是经济前景堪忧，以及唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策可能会减少联邦拨款。【原文：Illinois slashed its revenue forecast for the coming fiscal year by about $500 million, citing questions around the economic outlook and policies of President Donald Trump that could reduce federal funding.】

item.title: 监管机构称约 8,900 万美国人面临夏季电力短缺风险
item.description: 从上中西部到墨西哥湾沿岸的数百万美国人正面临着美国今夏最大的电力供应短缺威胁。【原文：Millions of Americans from the upper Midwest to the Gulf Coast are facing the biggest threat of power supply shortfalls in the US this summer.】

item.title: 秘鲁无休止的政治变动正蔓延至财政部长职位
item.description: 秘鲁混乱的内阁改组凸显了政治不稳定是如何蔓延到财政部长这一曾经备受珍视的职位上的。【原文：Peru’s messy cabinet reshuffle is spotlighting how political instability is spreading to what was once a treasured post: the finance minister.】

item.title: 卡尼推迟加拿大预算，计划在七月前降低所得税
item.description: 加拿大将于 7 月 1 日把最低个人所得税税率从 15%降至 14%，但总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的新政府不会在夏季到来之前公布预算。【原文：Canada will cut the lowest personal income tax rate to 14% from 15% on July 1, but Prime Minister Mark Carney’s new government won’t release a budget before the summer months.】

item.title: 交易员减少对美联储降息的押注，国债再次下滑
item.description: 周三，国债收益率攀升，两年期国债收益率升至 3 月份以来的最高水平，原因是交易商进一步降低了对美联储年底前降息超过一次的预期。【原文：Treasury yields climbed on Wednesday — sending the two-year note’s to the highest level since March — as traders further pared wagers on more than one Federal Reserve interest-rate cut by year-end.】

item.title: 贸易担忧缓解，银行策略师更加看好信贷市场
item.description: 在中美贸易谈判取得突破性进展为企业债务市场注入乐观情绪后，包括高盛集团在内的华尔街信贷分析师们纷纷上调了对今年的预测，并采取了更为乐观的展望。【原文：Wall Street credit analysts at firms including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are tearing up their forecasts for the year and adopting more upbeat outlooks, after a breakthrough in US-China trade talks injected optimism into corporate debt markets.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉感谢特朗普让幼儿与母亲团聚
item.description: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗感谢唐纳德-特朗普允许一名幼儿与母亲团聚，这可能预示着两国政府关系的解冻。【原文：Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro thanked Donald Trump for allowing a toddler to be reunited with her mother, potentially signaling a thaw in relations between the two governments.】

item.title: 德意志银行晋升 Sam Kim 为全球并购业务主管
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）任命塞缪尔-金（Samuel Kim）为其全球并购主管，接替最近在该公司担任更高级职务的艾莉森-哈丁-琼斯（Alison Harding-Jones）。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has named Samuel Kim as its global head of mergers and acquisitions, taking over from Alison Harding-Jones who recently took up a more senior role at the firm.】

item.title: 美国不会把削弱美元作为关税谈判的一部分
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，寻求在全球范围内就贸易协议进行谈判的美国官员并没有努力在协议中纳入货币政策承诺。【原文：US officials seeking to negotiate trade deals around the world are not working to include currency policy pledges in the agreements, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易平台 EToro 在 6.2 亿美元扩大首次公开募股规模后大涨 42
item.description: 交易和投资平台 EToro Group Ltd. 及其部分支持者在首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集了近 6.2 亿美元资金，在其成为上市公司后的首个交易日，股价涨幅高达 42%。【原文：EToro Group Ltd. shares rose as much as 42% in its first session as a public company, after the trading and investment platform and some of its backers raised nearly $620 million in an upsized IPO.】

item.title: 苹果准备推出让 Vision Pro 用户用眼睛滚动的功能
item.description: 苹果公司正在为其 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机开发一项功能，让用户可以用眼睛滚动浏览软件，旨在通过新颖的界面增强该设备的功能。【原文：Apple Inc. is developing a feature for its Vision Pro headset that lets users scroll through software with their eyes, aiming to enhance the device with a novel interface.】

item.title: 尼日利亚 Seplat 公司上半年收入超过去年的 11 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚最大的石油和天然气勘探公司 Seplat Energy Plc 在提高产量后，预计上半年收入将超过去年的 11 亿美元。【原文：Seplat Energy Plc, Nigeria’s largest oil and gas explorer, expects first-half revenue to exceed last year’s $1.1 billion after ramping-up production.】

item.title: 瑞安-雷诺兹的广告公司 MNTN 首次公开募股，持股人寻求 1.87 亿美元投资
item.description: 互联电视广告平台 MNTN 公司及其部分股东正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集多达 1.87 亿美元的资金，此前由于关税引发的市场波动，该公司推迟了首次公开募股。【原文：Connected TV advertising platform MNTN Inc. and some of its shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $187 million in an initial public offering, after delaying the launch amid tariff-induced market volatility.】

item.title: 杜塔令人不安的经济现实依然存在
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 裕信银行致函德国新政府，提出进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）已向德国新政府发出贺信，表示愿意进行谈判，这表明这家意大利银行看到了改善紧张关系的潜在机会。【原文：UniCredit SpA has sent congratulatory letters to the new German government offering talks, according to people familiar with the matter, indicating the Italian bank is seeing a potential opening to improve fraught relations.】
